description: Kedarnath Yatra, a pilgrimage journey for one of the four Dhams for Hindu devotees, has witnessed a rise in online scams in recent years. The Uttarakhand government is cracking down on fake helicopter ticket booking scams. Fraudsters have been creating fake ticket booking websites and are advertising them via social media pages, to lure devotees looking to book a helicopter ride.
title: Kedarnath Yatra Helicopter Booking Online Scam: Uttarakhand Police STF Reportedly Cracks Down on Cybercriminals

description: Walt Disney is expanding a program of perks for subscribers to its flagship Disney+ streaming service. Subscribers who sign-in through the Disney+ website will be able to redeem perks such as discounts on Disney resorts, free items in video games and a $10 (roughly Rs. 855) credit at Disney Pinnacle by Dapper Labs, which sells collectible pins.
title: Disney+ Expands Subscriber Perks, Including Movie Premieres

description: Google and US antitrust enforcers will make their final arguments on whether the tech giant should be forced to sell its Chrome browser. If the judge does require Google to sell off Chrome, OpenAI would be interested in buying it, Nick Turley, OpenAI's product head for ChatGPT, said at the trial.
title: Google, DOJ to Make Final Push in US Search Antitrust Case

description: Microsoft has reportedly paused its native Xbox handheld console development to prioritise optimising Windows 11 for third-party handhelds. The move aims to enhance performance and battery efficiency, to bring Windows 11 on par with Valve's SteamOS. Collaborative projects, such as the Xbox-branded Asus device (codenamed Project Kennan), remain unaffected and are still expected to launch.
title: Microsoft's Xbox Handheld Plans Reportedly Shelved; Company to Optimise Windows 11 Gaming Performance

description: Realme GT 7 and Realme GT 7T are now available for purchase in India. The Realme GT series smartphones were launched in the country last week alongside the Realme GT 7 Dream Edition, which will go on sale in India next month. The Realme GT 7 runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset, while the Realme GT 7T features the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Max chipset.
title: Realme GT 7, Realme GT 7T With 7,000mAh Batteries Go on Sale in India: Price, Specifications, Sale Offers

description: Perplexity Labs, a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature within the Perplexity platform, was introduced on Thursday. The company says the new mode can turn text prompts into full-fledged projects such as reports, spreadsheets, and even simple web apps. It uses a suite of tools, such as deep web browsing and code execution, to perform complex tasks that were so far beyond the scope of the platform.
title: Perplexity Labs Launched With Ability to Generate Spreadsheets, Reports and Create Web Apps

description: James Strudwick, executive director of Web3 firm Starknet Foundation, told Gadgets 360 that although Web3 gaming's growth might have appeared sluggish on the surface, the ecosystem had managed to make gradual progress in recent times. Strudwick said that onboarding challenges, unfamiliar UX, and limited awareness were among crucial factors that were keeping the growth of the industry tepid.
title: Starknet Foundation’s James Strudwick on Why Web3 Gaming Adoption Remains Stagnant

description: Vivo T4 Ultra will launch in India soon. While the exact date remains unannounced, the phone is confirmed to be sold via Flipkart. The upcoming Vivo T-series smartphone will ship with a triple rear camera unit. It is anticipated to come with upgraded specifications over the Vivo T3 Ultra, which was unveiled in the country in September last year.
title: Vivo T4 Ultra Launch in India Teased; Company Hints at Periscope Telephoto Camera With 100x Zoom

description: The iPhone 17 series has been subject to leaks and rumours for some months now. The lineup is expected to include four models — iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max. The development of the new iPhone family has not been confirmed by Apple yet, but ahead of it, a supply chain insider has suggested the display details of the standard iPhone 17.
title: iPhone 17 Said to Feature Larger Screen With Long-Awaited Refresh Rate Upgrade

description: The existence of Oppo’s next clamshell foldable is currently a mystery. It was previously reported that the company had halted work on its next clamshell device, which would have been the Oppo Find N5 Flip. The device was missing at the Oppo Find N5 announcement, which took place in February this year, hinting that the Chinese brand may have dropped the idea of clamshell foldable device completely. Now, a new yet familiar-looking device has shown up on a patent website hinting otherwise.
title: Oppo Find N5 Flip Reportedly in Development, Schematics Hint at Updated Design With New Camera Layout

description: Vivo TWS Air 3 was launched in China on Thursday alongside the Vivo S30 and Vivo S30 Pro Mini. The true-wireless-stereo (TWS) earphones is equipped with a 12mm dynamic driver and offers support for noise reduction backed by artificial intelligence (AI). As per the company, the Vivo TWS Air 3 TWS earphones comes with Bluetooth 6.0 and supports SBC, AAC, and other audio codecs.
title: Vivo TWS Air 3 With Spatial Audio, Up to 45-Hour Battery Life Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Gemini in Gmail is getting a new feature with the Google Workspace May feature drop. On Thursday, the Mountain View-based tech giant announced that it is adding summary cards in emails that are either very long or are part of a long email thread. These summary cards will automatically appear at the top of the email to help users gain context about the message.
title: Gmail Introduces Gemini AI-Powered Summary Cards With Google Workspace May Feature Drop

description: Redmi is said to be developing a new smartphone which could ship with the latest Xiaomi HyperOS 2 operating system. A purported handset from the Xiaomi subsidiary was reportedly spotted on a certification site which not only confirms its existence but also sheds light on several specifications. The Redmi phone is expected to come with up to 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of onboard storage. It is said to support Wi-Fi 6, NFC, and Bluetooth connectivity options.
title: Mystery Redmi Phone With Xiaomi HyperOS 2 Reportedly Surfaces on FCC Certification Site

description: WhatsApp has launched a new set of features for Status updates on Thursday. The Meta-owned instant messaging platform now allows users to post collages, music and new stickers to their Status updates. With the latest update, WhatsApp's Status feature works much like Stories on Facebook and Instagram. In addition to enhancing status updates, WhatsApp is said to be working on a new privacy feature that would let each user choose a unique username.
title: WhatsApp Adds Collages, Photo Stickers to Its Status Feature; Username Picker Spotted in Development on iOS

description: Google is said to make a switch from Samsung Foundry to MediaTek for the modem in its Pixel 10 series, but it will not affect an important connectivity feature. The handsets, which are expected to be unveiled later this year, have been rumoured to feature the Tensor G5 chipset developed in collaboration with TSMC instead of Samsung.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series to Debut With Satellite Connectivity Despite Switch to MediaTek Modem: Report

description: Microsoft touted its progress selling AI tools to corporate customers during a companywide town hall this week. The world’s largest software maker is considered a leader in commercializing AI products, thanks to its close partnership with ChatGPT maker OpenAI, and has been embedding Copilot in its suite of productivity applications.
title: Microsoft Touts AI Sales at Town Hall, Reveals Barclays Contract

description: The US SEC has moved to end its legal battle against Binance. The regulator and the exchange’s co-founder Changpeng Zhao filed a joint motion on Thursday to stay the case in the US District Court for the District of Columbia.
title: SEC Dropping Enforcement Case Against Binance Crypto Exchange

description: The crypto market cap tumbled by two percent in the last 24 hours. Both Bitcoin and Ether reflected minor dips on Friday. Solana, Cardano, and Tron also saw price drops alongside BTC and ETH. Ardor and Status are among a handful of altcoins in seeing small gains.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Falls to $106,000 Mark as Market Consolidates, Most Altcoins Dip

description: Instagram now supports 3:4 aspect ratio photos, a default format for many smartphone cameras. Users can now upload images without the need for prior cropping, streamlining the sharing process. Previously, the platform only allowed images in 5:4 or 1:1 (square) aspect ratios to be uploaded, while others would need to be cropped.
title: Instagram Adds Support for 3:4 Aspect Ratio Photos Shot Using Smartphone Cameras

description: Samsung recently commenced the rollout of the Android 16-based One UI 8 Beta. A tipster suggests that it will bring several new features for Game Booster — a free-to-download app which is designed to improve the gaming experience on Galaxy devices. It is tipped to get a Max boost feature which may optimise the phone’s settings to deliver maximum performance.
title: Samsung Tipped to Bring Max Boost and Other Game Booster Features With One UI 8

description: Xiaomi 16 is expected to debut later this year as a successor to last year's Xiaomi 15. Months ahead of the rumoured launch schedule, a tipster has suggested the key specifications of the flagship. The phone is tipped to ship with the Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 chipset.
title: Xiaomi 16 Tipped to Get Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 Chipset, Triple Rear Cameras, More

description: Google Calendar was being used as a communication channel by a group of hackers to extract sensitive information from individuals, according to the Google Threat Intelligence Group (GTIG). The tech giant’s cybersecurity division discovered a compromised government website in October 2024 and found that malware was being spread using it. Once the malware infected a device, it would create a backdoor using Google Calendar and allow the operator to extract data.
title: Google Shuts Down Malware That Leveraged Google Calendar to Steal Data

description: The telecom industry overall added 1.9 million subscribers in April. As per TRAI, Jio's subscriber additions improved from 2.2 million in March and 1.8 million in February to 2.6 million in April. The operator's active subscriber base also surged by 5.5 million, a sharp uptick from 5.0 million in March and only marginal gains in the two months before that.
title: Reliance Jio Leads April Subscriber Gains, BSNL Loses 1.8 Million Active Subscribers: TRAI Data

description: Vivo Pad 5 was launched in China on Thursday, alongside the Vivo S30 series smartphones. The new Android tablet runs on Android 15-based Origin OS 5 and is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset paired with a maximum 16GB of RAM and a maximum 512GB of storage. The Vivo Pad 5 features a 2.8K resolution display with a 7.1:5 aspect ratio and 144Hz refresh rate.
title: Vivo Pad 5 With MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ Chipset, 10,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Motorola’s Edge 50 Fusion was not the smartphone we expected it to be when we reviewed it last year. This year, Motorola decided on adding a few upgrades, which includes a slightly better processor,a slightly bigger battery and a new camera sensor to which essentially is the same phone. To our surprise, these smaller changes and optimisations do make for a better and easy to recommend mid-ranger.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion Review: Minor Yet Meaningful Upgrades

description: Motorola G86, G86 Power, and G56 were launched in select markets on Thursday. The Motorola G86 and G86 Power share several of the same specifications. They are powered by a Dimensity 7300 chipset and sport 120Hz AMOLED screens, a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-600 camera, and come with MIL-STD 810H military standard durability rating.
title: Motorola G86 and G86 Power With Dimensity 7300 Chipsets Launched Alongside Motorola G56

description: Nothing Phone 3 is scheduled to be introduced in July as the company’s first-ever flagship-grade smartphone. The UK-based original equipment manufacturer (OEM) has now teased that despite packing several promising upgrades, its purported handset will miss out on a feature that has become synonymous with Nothing smartphones since the Phone 1 — the Glyph Interface.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Teased to Drop Signature Glyph Interface in Major Design Shift
